resources.string:
Create your custom palette depend on what you select: 
 - Number of colors: how many color in your palette. 
 - Alignment: color will sort in what orientation: horizon or vertical. 
 - Percent: percent of this color in total area. 
 - Color background: color which you want to create.

Convert from one color mode to another mode: \n - With HEX mode: you can input your value with or without # \n - With other mode (RGB, HSV) have more than one value, you must fill space between each value.

Compare two color in all color mode: \n - To select color to compare, long press on one color and choose CHOOSE TO COMPARE in dialog. \n - Repeat again with another color to compare with previous selection color.
List of material color - Design by Google. \n Refer from http://www.google.com/design/spec/style/color.html

List of colors you copied to clipboard before. It will be cleared whenever you exit application \n - To remove one color from list, long press on that color and choose DELETE. \n - To remove all color, long press on any color and choose DELETE ALL.
List of colors you added to bookmark. \n - To remove one color from list, long press on that color and choose DELETE. \n - To remove all color, long press on any color and choose DELETE ALL.
